channel.title: RSCD not working, GlassDagger RSC Private Server
channel.description:
Run.Bat is in the same folder as build.xml, however this error is presented:
[code] 'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Build.bat returns the same error, any solution?
